title: Science Inquiry Competency Enhancement Course Using Immersive Learning Environments and Systems Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining mobile device-based microlearning modules with immersive simulation tools in a BYOD setting.

learning_goals: Learners can create a systems thinking map analyzing interactions between elements within a scientific system.
Learners can simulate scientific problem-solving processes with over 80% accuracy in an immersive virtual laboratory environment.
Learners can propose improvements to science learning environments by applying the educational system restructuring framework (Frick, 1993).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
